subject: Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: In its quest to stand out in 1997, an L.I.U. team broke a cardinal rule of sportsmanship by blowing out Medgar Evers College, 179-62.
snippet: In its quest to stand out in 1997, an L.I.U. team broke a cardinal rule of sportsmanship by blowing out Medgar Evers College, 179-62.
